name: Mario Kart Wii Kart Rumble File
summary: Vibration.krm is the file that controls when and how Wiimotes vibrate while playing Mario Kart Wii, a racing game for the Nintendo Wii. It contains binary data that a Wii sends to players' Wiimotes, causing the Wiimotes to vibrate in time with collisions and other in-game actions. Vibration.krm is stored in Mario Kart Wii's Common.szs file.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
